item.title: Tips for functions
item.description: Functions The following are tips for creating functions in a way that they're easily composable and reusable. The words must and should are used as "in order to get the benefit of the tip", not as an imperative instruction. Function names A function should always have a verb in their name since a function implies an action: Calling it "does something". const getName = user => { return user.
